channel.title: Prayer

item.title: Prayer
item.dc:creator: @Terraforming Terraforming
item.description:
@Terraforming wrote:

Here you go matey!

Add this code to your Prayer.java

[code=java]
private int boneAmount = 0;
public void xAmount(final int id, int amount) {
if(amount >= 1 && c.usingAltar && c.getItems().playerHasItem(id,1)) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(id, c.getItems().getItemSlot(id), 1);
c.getPA().addSkillXP(getExp(id)2Config.PRAYER_EXPERIENCE, 5);
c.startAnimation(713);
c.sendMessage(“You crush the bones on the altar, and receive some experience.”);
if (c.absX == 3091 && c.absY == 3506) {
c.getPA().stillGfx(624, 3092, 3506, 0, 0);
} else if (c.absX == 3092 && c.absY == 3505) {
c.getPA().stillGfx(624, 3092, 3506, 0, 0);
} else if (c.absX == 3093 && c.absY == 3505) {
c.getPA().stillGfx(624, 3093, 3506, 0, 0);
} else if (c.absX == 3094 && c.absY == 3506) {
c.getPA().stillGfx(624, 3093, 3506, 0, 0);
}
}
amount–;
boneAmount = amount;
CycleEventHandler.getSingleton().addEvent(this, new CycleEvent() {
@Override
public void execute(CycleEventContainer altar) {
if (boneAmount > 0&&c.usingAltar && c.getItems().playerHasItem(id,1)) {
boneAmount–;
c.getItems().deleteItem(id, c.getItems().getItemSlot(id), 1);
c.sendMessage(“The gods are pleased with your offering.”);
c.getPA().addSkillXP(getExp(id)2Config.PRAYER_EXPERIENCE, 5);
c.startAnimation(713);
if (c.absX == 3091 && c.absY == 3506) {
c.getPA().stillGfx(624, 3092, 3506, 0, 0);
} else if (c.absX == 3092 && c.absY == 3505) {
c.getPA().stillGfx(624, 3092, 3506, 0, 0);
} else if (c.absX == 3093 && c.absY == 3505) {
c.getPA().stillGfx(624, 3093, 3506, 0, 0);
} else if (c.absX == 3094 && c.absY == 3506) {
c.getPA().stillGfx(624, 3093, 3506, 0, 0);
}
} else
altar.stop();
}
@Override
public void stop() {
c.usingAltar=false;
}
}, 6);

	}[/code]

Add this to useitem.java

case 409: if (c.getPrayer().isBone(itemId) && c.usingAltar==false) { c.usingAltar=true; c.altarItemId=itemId; c.getOutStream().createFrame(27); } break;

Add this to bankX2.java

if(c.usingAltar==true)
		c.getPrayer().bonesOnAltar2(c.altarItemId, Xamount);

Add this to client.java or Player.

public boolean usingAltar = false;
public int altarItemId = 0;

[size=14pt]Credits to: Raverz[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

Just use the same code as for “Buy X” but make it start off “if you use a bone on the altar” it pops up with the interface to type in your number and have it remove the bones one at a time until the number has been reached or you ran out of bones
